<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> to forward loads in a loop around the backedge to subsequent iterations. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/looploadeliminationpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This header defines the LoopLoadEliminationPass object.

This pass forwards loaded values around loop backedges to allow their use in subsequent iterations.
